LanguageData.RestartRequiredLabel: Note: A restart is required for settings to take effect.
LanguageData.HoloAnimalColourSettingTooltip: The colour of all holo animals. Values are in RGB format, ranging from (0, 0, 0) to (255, 255, 255). Default = (108, 218, 244).
LanguageData.ModSettingsApplyToCustomSettingLabel: Mod settings apply to custom holographic animals
LanguageData.ModSettingsApplyToCustomSettingTooltip: Toggle whether mod settings such as colour are applied to holographic animals that are not automatically generated. Default = false.
